Literature.Title: The effect of lipidation and glycosylation on short cationic antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Author: Grimsey E, Collis DWP, Mikut R, Hilpert K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=1µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=4µg/ml),Salmonella enterica serovar Typhimurium(MIC=2µg/ml)
